name: HUNTS - Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information (T1140)
description: Identifies use of Certutil or copy /b to deobfuscate data/files

arguments.comment: SIEM query identified a potential attempt to use the command "copy /b" to deobfuscate/decode files or information through {{vars.item.process_exec}} on {{vars.item.host}} at {{vars.item.UtcTime}}.
arguments.description: An attempt to utilize Copy /b to was observed. An attacker could use the command Copy /b to read data as binary and then interact with/utilize the data elsewhere. This attack has been observed being conducted by nation-state actors and other malicious entities to join together binary fragments to assemble and run executables.

params.query: index=sysmon EventCode=1 {{vars.splunkHuntStart}} {{vars.splunkHuntEnd}} Image="C:\\Windows\\System32\\certutil.exe" OR  Image="C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\certutil.exe" |  table host Image MD5 ParentImage User CommandLine process_exec EventChannel UtcTime ParentProcessId ProcessId ParentCommandLine ProcessGuid Computer

index=sysmon EventCode=1 {{vars.splunkHuntStart}} {{vars.splunkHuntEnd}} Image="C:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe" OR  Image="C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\cmd.exe" CommandLine="*copy /b*" | table host Image MD5 ParentImage User CommandLine process_exec EventChannel UtcTime ParentProcessId ProcessId ParentCommandLine ProcessGuid Computer

arguments.title: T1140 - Hunt for Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information

arguments.comment: SIEM query identified a possible attempt to use {{vars.item._source.image_path.split("\\")[-1]}} to Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information on {{vars.item._source.beat.hostname}} at {{vars.item._source.event_data.UtcTime}}.
arguments.description: An attempt to utilize Certutil.exe to decode data was observed. An attacker could use Certutil to deobfuscate data and then interact with/utilize the data elsewhere.

arguments.comment: SIEM query identified a potential attempt to use the command "copy /b" to deobfuscate/decode files or information through {{vars.item._source.image_path.split("\\")[-1]}} to Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information on {{vars.item._source.beat.hostname}} at {{vars.item._source.event_data.UtcTime}}.
arguments.description: An attempt to utilize Copy /b to was observed. An attacker could use the command Copy /b to read data as binary and then interact with/utilize the data elsewhere. This attack has been observed being conducted by nation-state actors and other malicious entities to join together binary fragments to assemble and run executables.

arguments.comment: SIEM query identified a possible attempt to use {{vars.item.process_exec}} to Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information on {{vars.item.host}} at {{vars.item.UtcTime}}.
arguments.description: An attempt to utilize Certutil.exe to decode data was observed. An attacker could use Certutil to deobfuscate data and then interact with/utilize the data elsewhere.

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon @timestamp:{ {{vars.elasticHuntStart}} TO {{vars.elasticHuntEnd}} } AND event_id:1 AND (image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\certutil.exe" OR image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\certutil.exe") AND event_data.CommandLine:"*-decode*"

routes.name: Query for Copy B -> Copy  of return certutil query
Set Elastic hunt times -> Copy  of Elastic query for Certutil
Create and Elastic Link Alert -> Deduplicate Comments
Select SIEM -> Set Splunk hunt times
Set Elastic hunt times -> Elastic query for Certutil
Copy  of Create Splunk Alert -> Deduplicate Comments
Elastic query for Certutil -> Copy  of Create and Link Alert
return certutil query -> Create Splunk Alert
Copy  of Elastic query for Certutil -> Create and Elastic Link Alert2
Set Splunk hunt times -> Query for certutil
Copy  of Create and Elastic Link Alert -> Deduplicate Comments
Return copy b query -> Copy  of Create Splunk Alert
Set Splunk hunt times -> Query for Copy B
Query for certutil -> return certutil query
Select SIEM -> Convert time for elastic
